entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
